dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A. C. Berg
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO is a dataset for referring image segmentation, where referring expressions are collected using the ReferitGame. It allows models to learn to segment objects in images based on natural language descriptions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A. C. Berg
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO+ is a variant of RefCOCO that focuses solely on appearance and disallows the use of location words in the referring expressions, making it a more challenging dataset for referring image segmentation.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: S. KAZEMZADE
V. Ordonez
M. MATTENV
dcterms:description: ReferIt is a dataset for referring image segmentation that contains a diverse set of images and referring expressions, collected from the ImageCLEF IAPR dataset, allowing models to learn to segment objects based on natural language descriptions.
dcterms:title: ReferIt

dcterms:creator: H.-S. Fang
C. Wang
M. Gou
C. Lu
dcterms:description: GraspNet is a large-scale benchmark for general object grasping, providing a dataset that includes various objects and their grasping poses, useful for training models in robotics and manipulation tasks.
dcterms:title: GraspNet
